article: rebel cleric muqtada al-sadr on friday asked the shiite religious authority to take control of najaf 's flash-point old city , where his mahdi army militiamen have been stationed , and he defended his uprising against coalition forces .
abstract: al-sadr offers to hand over najaf 's old city to religious authorities ; defends his uprising
